info.title: validateaddress example
info.description: This is an API example for validateaddress, a method to validate a Bitcoin address and provide information  about it.

200.description: Information about the validation of the address.

isvalid.description: Whether the address is a valid Bitcoin address.

scriptPubKey.description: The hex-encoded scriptPubKey generated by the address.

ismine.description: Whether the address belongs to the wallet (if wallet support is enabled).

iswatchonly.description: Whether the address is watch-only (if wallet support is enabled).

isscript.description: Whether the address is a script.

script.description: The type of script, if `isscript` is true.

hex.description: The hex-encoded redeemScript (for P2SH) or witnessScript (for P2WSH), if applicable.

addresses.description: Array of addresses associated with the script (for multisig scripts).

sigsrequired.description: Number of signatures required (for multisig scripts).

pubkey.description: The hex-encoded public key (for P2PKH and P2WPKH addresses).

iscompressed.description: Whether the public key is compressed.

account.description: DEPRECATED. The account associated with the address (will be removed in future  versions).

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the address if known.

hdkeypath.description: The HD keypath, if the address is HD wallet related.

hdseedid.description: The Hash160 of the HD seed.

hdmasterfingerprint.description: The fingerprint of the master key.
